headline: How T-Mobile’s New “Better Value” Plan and Funding Moves Will Impact T-Mobile US (TMUS) Investors
summary: Earlier this week, T-Mobile US introduced its Better Value family plan, bundling premium 5G data, international roaming, streaming perks and a five‑year price guarantee, while also expanding its revolving credit facility to US$10.00 billion and issuing long‑dated senior notes to reinforce liquidity. This combination of a value-focused flagship plan and additional funding capacity highlights how T-Mobile is using both commercial offers and balance sheet flexibility to compete aggressively on...

headline: T-Mobile makes bold phone plan change after customer losses
summary: T-Mobile, one of the top phone carriers in the U.S., is shifting its strategy as it battles increased customer losses and tougher competition from its growing list of rivals. headline: Upcoming Q4 Results Could Trigger a Rally in T-Mobile US (TMUS)
summary: T-Mobile US Inc. (NASDAQ:TMUS) is one of the best communication services stocks according to Hedge Funds. headline: Lumos CEO to retire
summary: HIGH POINT — Internet service provider Lumos on Friday announced the upcoming retirement of CEO Brian Stading and the promotions of two of its executives. The moves are part of what the company terms a planned transition designed to further its growth strategy and expansion priorities for its fiber broadband network.
